problem:
long double f[1<<18],a;main(n,m,k,r,i,j){scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);for(i=1;i<=m;++i)f[i]=f[i-1]+log(i);for(i=0;i<=n;++i)for(j=0;j<=n;++j){r=n*(i+j)-i*j;a+=k>=r?exp(2*f[n]-f[i]-f[n-i]-f[j]-f[n-j]+f[m-r]-f[k-r]-f[m]+f[k]):0;}
a=a>1e99?1e99:a;printf("%.9f\n",(double)a);}
fixed:
n,m,k,r,j;long double f[1<<18],a;main(i){scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);for(;i<=m;++i)f[i]=f[i-1]+log(i);for(i=0;i<=n;++i)for(j=0;j<=n;++j){r=n*(i+j)-i*j;a+=k>=r?exp(2*f[n]-f[i]-f[n-i]-f[j]-f[n-j]+f[m-r]-f[k-r]-f[m]+f[k]):0;}
a=a>1e99?1e99:a;printf("%.9f\n",(double)a);return 0;}

problem: kyfu
int t,n,x,sum,zeros;main(){scanf("%d",&t);while(t--){scanf("%d",&n);while(n--){scanf("%d",&x);x?sum+=x:zeros++;}sum+=zeros;printf("%d\n",(sum?zeros:zeros+1));}}
fixed: main(){int t;scanf("%d",&t);while(t--){int n,x,sum=0,zeros=0;scanf("%d",&n);while(n--){scanf("%d",&x);x?sum+=x:zeros++;}sum+=zeros;printf("%d\n",(sum?zeros:zeros+1));}}
